items.name: Component_TilingSprite
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_TilingSprite
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_TilingSprite extends gs.Component_Sprite
    ###*
    * A tiling sprite component tiles the image of the game object on screen. The
    * tiling can be vertical, horizontal or both. The sprite can be managed or
    * unmanaged. A managed sprite is automatically added to the graphics-system
    * and processed every frame until it gets disposed. An unmanaged sprite needs
    * to be added and removed manually.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_TilingSprite
    * @extends gs.Component_Sprite
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    * @param {boolean} managed - Indicates if the sprite is managed by the graphics system.
    ###
    constructor: (managed) ->
        @sprite = null
        @image = null
        @video = null
        @imageFolder = "Graphics/Pictures"
        @visible = yes
        @looping = vertical: yes, horizontal: yes
        @scroll = x: 0, y: 0
    
    
    ###*
    * Creates sprite object.
    *
    * @method setupSprite
    ###
    setupSprite: ->
        if !@sprite
            @sprite = new gs.TilingSprite(Graphics.viewport, managed ? yes)
        
    ###*
    * Updates the padding.
    *
    * @method updatePadding
    ###
    updatePadding: ->
        if @object.padding?
            @sprite.rect.x += @object.padding.left
            @sprite.rect.y += @object.padding.top
            @sprite.rect.width -= @object.padding.left+@object.padding.right
            @sprite.rect.height -= @object.padding.bottom+@object.padding.bottom
            
    ###*
    * Updates the source- and destination-rectangle of the game object so that
    * the associated bitmap fits in. 
    *
    * @method updateRect
    ###
    updateRect: ->
        if @sprite.bitmap?
            @object.srcRect = new Rect(0, 0, @sprite.bitmap.width, @sprite.bitmap.height)
          #  @object.dstRect.width = @object.srcRect.width
          #  @object.dstRect.height = @object.srcRect.height
            
    ###*
    * Updates the sprite properties from the game object properties.
    *
    * @method updateProperties
    ###
    updateProperties: ->
        super()

        @sprite.zoomX = @object.zoom.x
        @sprite.zoomY = @object.zoom.y
        @sprite.vertical = @looping.vertical
        @sprite.horizontal = @looping.horizontal
        @sprite.x = @scroll.x
        @sprite.y = @scroll.y
        @sprite.angle = @object.angle
        @sprite.rect.x = @object.dstRect.x #- @object.dstRect.width * (@object.zoom.x - 1.0) * @object.anchor.x
        @sprite.rect.y = @object.dstRect.y #- @object.dstRect.height * (@object.zoom.y - 1.0) * @object.anchor.y
        @sprite.rect.width = @object.dstRect.width
        @sprite.rect.height = @object.dstRect.height
        
    ###*
    * Updates the optional sprite properties from the game object properties.
    * @method updateOptionalProperties
    ###
    updateOptionalProperties: ->
        super
        
        if @object.zoom?
            @sprite.zoomX = @object.zoom.x
            @sprite.zoomY = @object.zoom.y
        
        
gs.Component_TilingSprite = Component_TilingSprite
